server.upload

Class GameUpload

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • server.upload.GameUpload
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class GameUpload
extends java.lang.Thread
    GameUpload handles the upload of a Game to a User.

    The GameUpload tracks the progress of the upload. The Upload can be stopped by calling stopUpload().

    Since:
    1.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameUpload

        public GameUpload(int port,
                  java.io.File gamepath,
                  Game game,
                  User user)
        Creates the GameUpload for the user to download the game.

        Opens a socket on the open port.

        Parameters:
        port - port, which is used on the user machine for the upload
        gamepath - packed gamefile of the game
        game - Game, which gets uploaded
        user - User, which requested to upload the game
        Since:
        1.0

      • getProgress

        public double getProgress()
        Returns the progress of the upload as a decimal. Range is from 0 to 1. The decimal has a precision of 4 decimals.
        Returns:
        progress of the upload
        Since:
        1.0
